TICKET_REAﾃﾃグ2: Hello! I'm Hope and I'm here to help you open a ticket. It's very simple, just click the button below <:SkyeCorreta:823047534602616832>
TICKET_REAﾃﾃグ3:
Hello! I am Hope and I will assist you in this process.

First, let's remember that `<> is necessary` e `[] is optional`!

Come on, you have two options to open a ticket:
 The first option is for you to go to the message sent by me in the Tickets channel of this server and react to it with 次.

The second option is to type in chat the command `{{prefix}}t-<create | open> [reason]` - to open a ticket.

<a:sirene:823004235440062464> The commands below are available only to the Administration of this server, ok?!

`{{prefix}}ticket reaction` - create a reaction message to open a ticket.
`{{prefix}}t-setup` - to configure the ticket command on this server.
